subject_name: Pfhumba ra HeForShe ra Nhlangano wa Matiko
title_for_the_content: Ku twisisa Pfhumba ra HeForShe ra ku Ringana ka Rimbewu
content: Pfhumba ra HeForShe i nhlangano wa vun’we bya misava hinkwayo lowu tumbuluxiweke hi Vavasati va UN, lowu kongomisaka ku tlakusa ndzingano wa rimbewu na ku nyika matimba eka vavasati hi ku katsa vavanuna na vafana tanihi vayimeri va ku cinca. Yi sunguriwile hi Matsalana-Jenerali wa UN Ban Ki-moon na Muyimeri wa UN Women World Goodwill Emma Watson, HeForShe yi nyika endlelo leri hlelekeke na pulatifomo leyi kongomisiweke ku nghenisa vavanuna na vanhu va rimbewu hinkwaro eka ku yima hi vun’we na vavasati ku tumbuluxa matimba ya xivindzi na vun’we eka rimbewu ku ringana. Pfhumba leri ri fambelanisiwa na Tipakani ta Nhluvukiso lowu Yaka emahlweni ta 2030 ta Nhlangano wa Matiko, ngopfungopfu SDG 5, naswona ri rhamba vanhu ku teka xitshembiso xa HeForShe, ku kombisa ku tinyiketela ka vona ku yisa emahlweni ndzingano wa rimbewu.

subsections.title: Switirhisiwa Swa Misava Ya Xiviri
subsections.content: Pfhumba ra HeForShe ri hlele swiendlakalo swo hlawuleka na migingiriko ku hlengeleta nseketelo wa ndzingano wa rimbewu, ku fana na swiendlakalo swa In Support of HeForShe leswi hleriweke hi UN Women USA Chapter. Ku engetela kwalaho, pfhumba ri humesile swiviko swa lembe na lembe swa nkucetelo, leswi kandziyisaka nkoka wa vun’we na vuxaka eku fambiseni ka migingiriko ya misava hinkwayo ya ndzingano wa rimbewu.

subsections.title: Switirhisiwa Swa Misava Ya Xiviri
subsections.content: Pfhumba ra HeForShe ri hlele swiendlakalo swo hlawuleka na migingiriko ku hlengeleta nseketelo wa ndzingano wa rimbewu, ku fana na swiendlakalo swa In Support of HeForShe leswi hleriweke hi UN Women USA Chapter. Ku engetela kwalaho, pfhumba ri humesile swiviko swa lembe na lembe swa nkucetelo, leswi kandziyisaka nkoka wa vun’we na vuxaka eku fambiseni ka migingiriko ya misava hinkwayo ya ndzingano wa rimbewu.

subsections.title: Switirhisiwa Swa Misava Ya Xiviri

Ku engetela kwalaho, pfhumba ri humesile swiviko swa lembe na lembe swa nkucetelo, leswi kandziyisaka nkoka wa vun’we na vuxaka eku fambiseni ka migingiriko ya misava hinkwayo ya ndzingano wa rimbewu.

subject_name: Ntirho wa Muyimeri wa Ntsako lowunene
title_for_the_content: Ku twisisa Ntirho wa Vayimeri va Ntsako lowunene
content: Muyimeri wa Ntsako lowunene i munhu wo tiveka eka vaaki kumbe phurofexini ya vona loyi a tirhaka tanihi mudiplomati wo xiximeka na muyimeri wa swivangelo swo hambana. Vayimeri va Ntsako lowunene i vatirhi vo tirhandzela lava leteriweke ku lemukisa na ku hlengeleta nseketelo eka minhlangano yo fana na UNICEF na Nhlangano wa Matiko. Ntirho wa Muyimeri wa Ntsako lowunene i ku hlanganisa migingiriko na swivilelo swa tinhlengeletano leti ku pfuneta ku ndlandlamuxa ku fikelela ka tona eka vaaki.

subsections.title: Vuleteri na Xitifikheti
subsections.content: Swirho swa Nongonoko wa Muyimeri wa Ntsakelo wa Ntsako swi nga ha va na mfikelelo eka tikhoso to tirhisana, minongonoko ya switifikheti, na nhlengeleto wo hlawuleka wa layiburari. Vuleteri lebyi byi va hlomisa hi vutivi na vuswikoti lebyi lavekaka ku seketela hi ndlela leyinene swivangelo leswi va swi seketelaka.

subsections.title: Vuleteri na Xitifikheti
subsections.content: Swirho swa Nongonoko wa Muyimeri wa Ntsakelo wa Ntsako swi nga ha va na mfikelelo eka tikhoso to tirhisana, minongonoko ya switifikheti, na nhlengeleto wo hlawuleka wa layiburari. Vuleteri lebyi byi va hlomisa hi vutivi na vuswikoti lebyi lavekaka ku seketela hi ndlela leyinene swivangelo leswi va swi seketelaka.

subsections.title: Vuleteri na Xitifikheti
subsections.content: Swirho swa Nongonoko wa Muyimeri wa Ntsakelo wa Ntsako swi nga ha va na mfikelelo eka tikhoso to tirhisana, minongonoko ya switifikheti, na nhlengeleto wo hlawuleka wa layiburari. Vuleteri lebyi byi va hlomisa hi vutivi na vuswikoti lebyi lavekaka ku seketela hi ndlela leyinene swivangelo leswi va swi seketelaka.

subject_name: Ku Nyikiwa Matimba eka Vavasati Lavantshwa
title_for_the_content: Ku Nyika Matimba Vavasati Lavantshwa Na Leswaku Ha Yini Swi Ri Swa Nkoka
content: Ku nyika matimba eka vanhwanyana i xilaveko xa vaaki lexi nga na switandzhaku swo hambana na leswi fikaka ekule. I vuvekisi eka vumundzuku lebyi katsaka hinkwavo na goza ra nkoka eka vaaki lava ringanaka no humelela. Atikili leyi yi lavisisa nkoka wa swiyenge swo tala wa ku nyikiwa matimba ka vavasati na mintlhontlho ya xihatla leyi vanhwanyana va langutaneke na yona entirhweni.

subsections.title: Tindlela to Kurisa Matimba ya Vavasati Lavantshwa
subsections.content: Minhlangano yo hlayanyana na minhlangano yo pfuneta va le ku tirheni ku nyika matimba eka vanhwanyana hi ku nyika switirhisiwa swa dyondzo, ndzetelo wa ntirho, tiwekhixopo ta vuswikoti, nseketelo wa vahlaseriwa, na mali eka timhaka ta timfanelo ta vavasati. Migingiriko leyi yi kongomisa eka ku tlakusa vutivi bya ku hlaya na ku tsala, ku ringana ka rimbewu, na ku tiyisela emahlweni ka mintlhontlho leyi simekiweke eka rimbewu.

subsections.title: Tindlela to Kurisa Matimba ya Vavasati Lavantshwa
subsections.content: Minhlangano yo hlayanyana na minhlangano yo pfuneta va le ku tirheni ku nyika matimba eka vanhwanyana hi ku nyika switirhisiwa swa dyondzo, ndzetelo wa ntirho, tiwekhixopo ta vuswikoti, nseketelo wa vahlaseriwa, na mali eka timhaka ta timfanelo ta vavasati. Migingiriko leyi yi kongomisa eka ku tlakusa vutivi bya ku hlaya na ku tsala, ku ringana ka rimbewu, na ku tiyisela emahlweni ka mintlhontlho leyi simekiweke eka rimbewu.

subsections.title: Tindlela to Kurisa Matimba ya Vavasati Lavantshwa
subsections.content: Minhlangano yo hlayanyana na minhlangano yo pfuneta va le ku tirheni ku nyika matimba eka vanhwanyana hi ku nyika switirhisiwa swa dyondzo, ndzetelo wa ntirho, tiwekhixopo ta vuswikoti, nseketelo wa vahlaseriwa, na mali eka timhaka ta timfanelo ta vavasati. Migingiriko leyi yi kongomisa eka ku tlakusa vutivi bya ku hlaya na ku tsala, ku ringana ka rimbewu, na ku tiyisela emahlweni ka mintlhontlho leyi simekiweke eka rimbewu.

title_for_the_content: Ku Tiyisa Vavasati Matimba Hi Ku Tirhisa Vuyimeri
content: Ntirho wa vuyimeri i xiphemu xa nkoka xa matshalatshala ya Vavasati va UN ku tisa mimbuyelo ya nkucetelo wa le henhla na ku cinca hi ku fambisana na Tipulani ta vona ta Maqhinga. Nhlangano wu kongomisa eka ntirho wa vuyimeri bya pholisi tanihi xiphemu xo tirhisa Pulani ya wona ya Nkambisiso wa Nhlangano, hi xikongomelo xo kambela ku yelana, ku tirha kahle, ku tirha kahle, na ku fambisana. UN Women yi tlhela yi tirhisana na tiejensi to hambana ta UN na matshalatshala yo tlakusa ndzingano wa rimbewu, ku nyikiwa matimba ka vavasati, na ku herisiwa ka madzolonga eka vavasati. Swikombiso swa xiviri swi katsa pfhumba ra HeForShe, pfhumba ra UNiTE ku Herisa Madzolonga eka Vavasati, na migingiriko yo seketela vurhangeri bya vavasati na ku lwisana na madzolonga lama simekiweke eka rimbewu.

subsections.title: Switirhisiwa swa Misava ya Xiviri swa Vuyimeri
subsections.content: Ku suka eka ku seketela vurhangeri bya vavasati ku ya eka ku lwisana na madzolonga lama simekiweke eka rimbewu, UN Women yi nghenelela eka matshalatshala ya vuyimeri bya xiviri. Xikombiso, nhlangano wu nghenelela eka migingiriko ku suka eka ku macha ka misava hinkwayo ku ya eka matshalatshala ya swa mahungu ya swa matirhiselo ya vanhu yo fana na #MeToo, ku kombisa marito ya vavasati na ku kombela ku ringana ka rimbewu. Ku engetela kwalaho, UN Women yi seketela migingiriko ya laha kaya, ku fana na ku sirhelela timfanelo ta vavasati ekhoto ya Shari’a na ku nyika matimba eka vavasati eka swiyimo swa le makaya na le madorobeni.

subsections.title: Switirhisiwa swa Misava ya Xiviri swa Vuyimeri
subsections.content: Ku suka eka ku seketela vurhangeri bya vavasati ku ya eka ku lwisana na madzolonga lama simekiweke eka rimbewu, UN Women yi nghenelela eka matshalatshala ya vuyimeri bya xiviri. Xikombiso, nhlangano wu nghenelela eka migingiriko ku suka eka ku macha ka misava hinkwayo ku ya eka matshalatshala ya swa mahungu ya swa matirhiselo ya vanhu yo fana na #MeToo, ku kombisa marito ya vavasati na ku kombela ku ringana ka rimbewu. Ku engetela kwalaho, UN Women yi seketela migingiriko ya laha kaya, ku fana na ku sirhelela timfanelo ta vavasati ekhoto ya Shari’a na ku nyika matimba eka vavasati eka swiyimo swa le makaya na le madorobeni.

subsections.title: Switirhisiwa swa Misava ya Xiviri swa Vuyimeri
subsections.content: Ku suka eka ku seketela vurhangeri bya vavasati ku ya eka ku lwisana na madzolonga lama simekiweke eka rimbewu, UN Women yi nghenelela eka matshalatshala ya vuyimeri bya xiviri. Xikombiso, nhlangano wu nghenelela eka migingiriko ku suka eka ku macha ka misava hinkwayo ku ya eka matshalatshala ya swa mahungu ya swa matirhiselo ya vanhu yo fana na #MeToo, ku kombisa marito ya vavasati na ku kombela ku ringana ka rimbewu. Ku engetela kwalaho, UN Women yi seketela migingiriko ya laha kaya, ku fana na ku sirhelela timfanelo ta vavasati ekhoto ya Shari’a na ku nyika matimba eka vavasati eka swiyimo swa le makaya na le madorobeni.

subject_name: Ku Tlakusa ku Ringana ka Rimbewu
title_for_the_content: Ku Tlakusa ku Ringana ka Rimbewu hi ku tirhisa Masungulo ya Pholisi
content: Ku tlakusa ndzingano wa rimbewu i xiphemu xa nkoka xa nhluvukiso wa vaaki na nhluvuko. Swi katsa tipholisi, migingiriko, na maendlelo lama kongomisiweke eka ku tiyisisa timfanelo to ringana, minkarhi, na ku khomiwa ka vanhu va vutivi hinkwabyo bya rimbewu. Tipholisi ta mfumo ti tlanga xiave xa nkoka eku tlakuseni ka ndzingano wa rimbewu na ku nyika matimba eka vavasati na vutivi byin’wana bya rimbewu. Minhlangano yo hambana, ku katsa na Bangi ya Misava na UNICEF, yi nghenelela hi xihatla eku lulamiseni ka mimpimanyeto ya ntshamiseko na rimbewu, ku tirhisa datha ya rimbewu, na ku pfuxeta swivumbeko swa nawu ku hatlisisa ku ringana ka rimbewu. Ku engetela kwalaho, dyondzo, ku lemukisa, na ku sivela madzolonga eka vavasati i swilo swa nkoka eku tlakuseni ka ndzingano wa rimbewu eka xiyimo xa le hansi.

subsections.title: Switirhisiwa Swa Misava Ya Xiviri
subsections.content: Matirhiselo ya xiviri ya ku tlakusa ndzingano wa rimbewu ya katsa ku simeka vutirhisani byo ringana ku nyika matimba eka vanhu va vutivi hinkwabyo bya rimbewu, ku twisisa nkoka wa ndzingano wa rimbewu, ku tidyondzisa hi ku ringana ka rimbewu na madzolonga eka vavasati, na ku sivela madzolonga eka vavasati. Magoza lawa ya tirhaka ya hoxa xandla eku tumbuluxeni ka misava yo ringana eka vavanuna na vavasati, laha ku nga na madzolonga yo tala eka vavasati.

subsections.title: Switirhisiwa Swa Misava Ya Xiviri
subsections.content: Matirhiselo ya xiviri ya ku tlakusa ndzingano wa rimbewu ya katsa ku simeka vutirhisani byo ringana ku nyika matimba eka vanhu va vutivi hinkwabyo bya rimbewu, ku twisisa nkoka wa ndzingano wa rimbewu, ku tidyondzisa hi ku ringana ka rimbewu na madzolonga eka vavasati, na ku sivela madzolonga eka vavasati. Magoza lawa ya tirhaka ya hoxa xandla eku tumbuluxeni ka misava yo ringana eka vavanuna na vavasati, laha ku nga na madzolonga yo tala eka vavasati.

title_for_the_content: Nkatsakanyo wa Tiphurojeke to Aka leti Taka
content: Tiphurojeke to aka ti tlanga xiave xa nkoka eka nhluvukiso na ku kula ka ikhonomi na switirhisiwa. Tiphurojeke leti taka hi 2022 na ku tlula ti lulamerile ku tisa ku cinca lokukulu na nhluvukiso eka swifundzankulu swo hambana. Ku suka eka tiphurojeke letikulu eU.S.A ku ya eka tiphurojeke ta switirhisiwa eKerala, ku na nhluvukiso wo anama lowu vekiweke ku vumba vumundzuku.

subsections.title: Tiphurojeke leti faneleke ku sukela hi 2021
subsections.content: Ku languta endzhaku eka tiphurojeke leti a ti vekiwa tihlo swinene hi 2021, ku katsa na nhluvukiso lowu xiyekaka ku fana na fektri ya Tesla Cybertruck eAustin, Texas, swi nyika vutivi bya nkoka eka nhluvuko lowu yaka emahlweni wa indasitiri yo aka na migingiriko leyi nga na nkucetelo leyi yaka emahlweni yi vumba ndhawu.

subsections.title: Tiphurojeke leti faneleke ku sukela hi 2021
subsections.content: Ku languta endzhaku eka tiphurojeke leti a ti vekiwa tihlo swinene hi 2021, ku katsa na nhluvukiso lowu xiyekaka ku fana na fektri ya Tesla Cybertruck eAustin, Texas, swi nyika vutivi bya nkoka eka nhluvuko lowu yaka emahlweni wa indasitiri yo aka na migingiriko leyi nga na nkucetelo leyi yaka emahlweni yi vumba ndhawu.
